item.title: Toll Free Number Availability Now
item.description: Considering a toll-free number for your business but worried about the hassle of finding an available one, dealing with paperwork, and waiting for service? There’s a much easier way. You can get a toll-free number set up immediately. Simply choose the number you want from a list and activate your service online in minutes at Kall8â€™s Instant Online Activation site. This fully automated self-service process is available 24/7, so you can start using your new toll-free number right away.
